item.title: Handling Graceful Shutdown in a .NET App Hosted in Kubernetes
item.description: I was recently involved with troubleshooting some API’s hosted in Kubernetes throwing http/502’s. This was incredibly difficult to diagnose because it seemingly happened at random, and I had never encountered anything like this. Being that I had never dealt with this in the past, and I (nor my team) was able to figure it out within a reasonable amount of time, I turned to google. My searches resulted in various blogs and SO posts of other people experiencing similar issues, but none of their resolutions worked for us.
